comment.author: 9599527@N05
comment._content: The title say 'Penygroes' and the sign behind the men say 'PEN . Y . CROES', could there be a mistake?

comment.author: 65901644@N00
comment._content: No, it's Pen-y-groes. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Penygroes_railway_station The lettering style used doesn't appear to have a very distinct G.
